attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that by giving free transport to under 21's we are not only helping students but we are also benefitting our planet in helping cut down on pollution. 25% of people who own a license are 16-20 years old, by reducing this, around a quarter of cars are taken away which would therefore result in less carbon emission and longer lives for us. Thank you
